objectives: Students will discuss food and dining out using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Mystery/Detective themed scenarios related to food and dining out
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining food and dining out content with Mystery/Detective narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore food and dining out through a Mystery/Detective lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a mysterious problem to solve involving food and dining out

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to food and dining out in a mystery context
Students engage in mystery themed role-play about food and dining out using neutral register
Students create original mystery themed content about food and dining out in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe food and dining out in a Mystery/Detective scenario?
What clue or investigation might be involved in food and dining out?
Can you create a Mystery/Detective story about food and dining out?
How does food and dining out change when viewed through a Mystery/Detective perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this mystery scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Mystery/Detective situation involving food and dining out
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in mystery context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within mystery theme

topic_genre_blend: food and dining out with clue
food and dining out with investigation
food and dining out with suspect

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Mystery/Detective theme: Investigation, puzzles, solving problems

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Mystery/Detective themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
